name: Exployre
overview:
Exployre gives adventurers a place to share with fellow thrill seekers, find inspiration to exployre, and discover great resources.

Exployre is a social network for people who need more excitement and regular life provides. As users participate they get discounts from Exployre’s partners who become “sponsors” of those users.

In addition to the main function of providing a place for members to share videos, photos, and news topics they can keep track of all their adventures on their profile and this allows users to find others in areas near them and to meet up and go exployre with these new found friends.
